description: [Status: stable] [Name: invalid-character-backspace] [Message: Invalid unescaped character backspace, use "\b" instead.] Description: Moves the cursor back, so the character after it will overwrite the character before. Problematic code: STRING = "Invalid character backspace  " # [invalid-character-backspace] Correct code: STRING = "Valid character backspace \b" Created by the unicode_checker checker.
